crown.name: Crown College
crown.description: High up with views and a science emphasis.

college-9.name: College 9
college-9.description: Focuses on international and global perspectives.

baskin.name: Baskin Engineering
baskin.description: Home to UCSC's School of Engineering.

rcp.name: Rachel Carson Housing
rcp.description: A college that focuses on environmental justice and conservation. Rachel Carson represents the minor sustainability studies, which is the only one out of all ten colleges on campus.

rcp2.name: Rachel Carson Housing
rcp2.description: A college that focuses on environmental justice and conservation. Rachel Carson represents the minor sustainability studies, which is the only one out of all ten colleges on campus.

rcp3.name: Rachel Carson Housing
rcp3.description: A college that focuses on environmental justice and conservation. Rachel Carson represents the minor sustainability studies, which is the only one out of all ten colleges on campus.

rcdininghall.name: Rachel Carson & Oakes Dining Hall
rcdininghall.description: A shared dining hall between two colleges: Rachel Carson and Oakes. Recently renovated with amazing views of lower campus, as well as one of the only dining halls open late night. With a big kitchen, this dining hall also supplies all freshly baked goods to other locations on campus.

rcacademy.name: Rachel Carson Academy
rcacademy.description: A college that focuses on environmental justice and conservation. Rachel Carson holds a small academy atop it's steps, a hotspot for sections and classrooms. The academy also holds numerous faculty offices and registrar.

fsh.name: Family Student Housing
fsh.description: A family-centered housing community that supports students balancing family, academic and social needs. It features a number of facilities similiar to a College and regularly host food pantries for struggling students.

fsh2.name: Family Student Housing
fsh2.description: A family-centered housing community that supports students balancing family, academic and social needs. It features a number of facilities similiar to a College and regularly host food pantries for struggling students.

fsh3.name: Family Student Housing
fsh3.description: A family-centered housing community that supports students balancing family, academic and social needs. It features a number of facilities similiar to a College and regularly host food pantries for struggling students.

oakesapt.name: Oakes Appartments
oakesapt.description: Diverse and inclusive social change mission. One of the oldest colleges on the very edge of the natural reserves, housing about 330 students yearly.

oakesapt2.name: Oakes Appartments
oakesapt2.description: Diverse and inclusive social change mission. One of the oldest colleges on the very edge of the natural reserves, housing about 330 students yearly.

oakesdorms.name: Oakes Dorms
oakesdorms.description: Diverse and inclusive social change mission. Oakes dorms houses students with a special mission towards diversity and challenging oppression of students from diverse backgrounds.

oakescafe.name: Oakes Cafe
oakescafe.description: A cafe located in the heart of Oakes. Features a diverse menu equipped with breakfast and lunch options, as well as a recently added boba machine in 2025. Popular amongst students for being a comforting lunch spot, as well as a nice patio for studying in the breeze. Next to it holds the Oakes Amphitheater.

oakesacademy.name: Oakes Academy
oakesacademy.description: Diverse and inclusive social change mission. Oakes Academy is equipped with a number of classrooms and a big lecture hall. They are most well known for their CORE classes, and being in close proximity of other Oakes facilities, making it an ideal option for students. Inside the Academy house the mailroom, office, and a quaint library that looks out into the natural reserves of UCSC. Next to it holds the Oakes Amphitheater.

hahn.name: Hahn Student Center
hahn.description: The hub for student services and support.

quarry.name: Quarry Plaza
quarry.description: Student hub with bookstore, food, and events.

pool.name: Aquatics Center
pool.description: The program offers swim lessons year-round for swimmers of all levels and ages in addition to health and safety courses, such as Lifeguarding Training and Water Safety Instructor (WSI)

village.name: The Village
village.description: a unique community for continuing students and new transfer students.

baskinPerk.name: Baskin Perk Coffee Bar
baskinPerk.description: A Perk's Coffee Bar located in the lobby of the Baskin Engineering building, offering fresh coffee, drinks, pastries, and a selection of grab-and-go meals.

collegeNineDiningHall.name: College Nine Dining Hall
collegeNineDiningHall.description: One of the several dining halls at UCSC, offering continuous dining with a variety of food stations all day, serving as a hub for community events and themed College Nights.

collegeNineDorms.name: College Nine Dorms
collegeNineDorms.description: A set of three residential halls - Hague, Gandhi, and Geneva - with fully furnished rooms, for a community centered around the theme of International and Global Perspectives.

ilc.name: International Living Center
ilc.description: An apartment complex for international students to foster intercultural understanding through shared living experiences, community events, and collaborative programs.

socialSciences1.name: Social Sciences 1
socialSciences1.description: An academic facility primarily for the Anthropology Department, hosting general classrooms, faculty offices, and laboratories.

socialSciences2.name: Social Sciences 2
socialSciences2.description: An academic facility primarily for the Psychology Department, hosting general classrooms, faculty offices, and the John R. Lewis College mailroom.

universityCenterCafe.name: University Center Cafe
universityCenterCafe.description: A cafe located above the College Nine/John R. Lewis Dining Hall, offering fresh coffee, drinks, pastries, and a selection of grab-and-go meals.

theater arts.name: Theater Arts
theater arts.description: A lecture hall located in the Elena Baskin Visual Arts department near art studios as well.
